name: All you need is Love HERE, THERE & EVERYWHERE
name_original: All you need is Love HERE, THERE & EVERYWHERE
description: This Bitsy game is inspired by the Beatles song All You need is Love. Literally the whole game is about LOVE . The Avatar collects the lyrics of the song until it reaches a diverse big group of people who join in singing and completing the last lyrics of the song. All you need is Love HERE, THERE & EVERYWHERE is aiming to replicate the peacefulness and the tranquility of the song in a visual environment . Enjoy it and Remember all you need is LOVE LOVE LOVE.. <3 <3
